MALAYSIA SHORTS

News aggregated and shorten to save your precious time!

  • FORD JUST EXPOSED THE BIGGEST LIE OF NET ZERO

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/big-companies-aren-t-being-060000120.html

    80.65% Shortened!

    Now is not a good time to be working in Britain’s car industry

    But it is the announcement of several thousand job losses at Ford that will send the biggest shockwaves through the global car sector – 3,800 in total, 2,300 of which will come in Germany, 1,300 in the UK, and the remaining 200 across the rest of Europe

    One of the central premises of net zero is that the resulting job destruction in old industries such as car-making, but also oil and gas exploration, construction and farming, will be more than offset by the job creation in green industries such as renewable energy – but if the remarks of Ford Germany’s boss Martin Sander are anything to go by, that looks doubtful at best

    “We are moving into a world with less [sic] global platforms where less engineering work is necessary

    This is why we have to make the adjustments.” Ford’s intervention is particularly significant because it is possible to extrapolate from the latest round of job cuts and arrive at an approximate figure for the industry as a whole as it goes electric

    But having been a late adopter, Ford is now among those leading the charge with a pledge to boost spending on electric vehicles to $50bn (£41bn), from $30bn previously, by 2026 and run its electric car unit separately from its legacy combustion engine operations, in a move aimed at catching trailblazer Tesla

    ['car', 'industry', 'say', 'electric', 'honda']

    Now is not a good time to be working in Britain’s car industry

    But it is the announcement of several thousand job losses at Ford that will send the biggest shockwaves through the global car sector – 3,800 in total, 2,300 of which will come in Germany, 1,300 in the UK, and the remaining 200 across the rest of Europe

    One of the central premises of net zero is that the resulting job destruction in old industries such as car-making, but also oil and gas exploration, construction and farming, will be more than offset by the job creation in green industries such as renewable energy – but if the remarks of Ford Germany’s boss Martin Sander are anything to go by, that looks doubtful at best

    “We are moving into a world with less [sic] global platforms where less engineering work is necessary

    This is why we have to make the adjustments.” Ford’s intervention is particularly significant because it is possible to extrapolate from the latest round of job cuts and arrive at an approximate figure for the industry as a whole as it goes electric

    But having been a late adopter, Ford is now among those leading the charge with a pledge to boost spending on electric vehicles to $50bn (£41bn), from $30bn previously, by 2026 and run its electric car unit separately from its legacy combustion engine operations, in a move aimed at catching trailblazer Tesla

    ['car', 'industry', 'say', 'electric', 'honda']



  • OFFICER IN HOSPITAL KAMPAR DRESSING DOWN INCIDENT REPRIMANDED, SAYS DIRECTOR

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/02/15/officer-in-hospital-kampar-dressing-down-incident-reprimanded-says-director

    02/15/2023, 20:08

    62.5% Shortened!

    Wednesday, 15 Feb 2023

    He said the hospital has reprimanded the officer involved in the kerfuffle over dress codes, and action has been taken to ensure that similar incidents do not recur

    In the 11pm incident on Sunday (Feb 12), a woman in her early 20s, arrived at the hospital's emergency unit seeking treatment, and her vitals were checked by a medical officer and found stable

    “The officer was reported to have said that the woman was wearing short pants, prompting the officer to get her a hospital gown

    "Before the officer managed to give the patient the gown, she had left the triage counter and informed other staff that she would seek treatment at a private clinic

    Dr Khairul Azha Azam

    ['feb', 'hospital', 'patient', 'treatment', 'dress']

  • MAN UTD TO ASK PLAYERS' OPINIONS ON GREENWOOD FUTURE - SOURCES

    https://www.espn.com/soccer/manchester-united-engman_utd/story/4878349/man-utd-to-ask-players-opinions-before-deciding-mason-greenwood-future-sources

    02/15/2023, 19:35

    57.14% Shortened!

    Manchester United will canvass player opinion from their men's and women's teams before deciding whether to reintegrate Mason Greenwood, sources have told ESPN

    United have launched an internal investigation after criminal charges against Greenwood were dropped

    The 21-year-old has not played for United since January 2022

    United have refused to comment on reports that manager Erik ten Hag has already spoken to Greenwood

    Sources have told ESPN that a number of sponsors would also have concerns about Greenwood returning to play for United

    Key partners are monitoring the internal investigation and will make a decision about their relationship with the club once a decision on Greenwood's future is made

    ['united', 'greenwood', 'source', 'told', 'espn']

    Manchester United will canvass player opinion from their men's and women's teams before deciding whether to reintegrate Mason Greenwood, sources have told ESPN

    United have launched an internal investigation after criminal charges against Greenwood were dropped

    The 21-year-old has not played for United since January 2022

    United have refused to comment on reports that manager Erik ten Hag has already spoken to Greenwood

    Sources have told ESPN that a number of sponsors would also have concerns about Greenwood returning to play for United

    Key partners are monitoring the internal investigation and will make a decision about their relationship with the club once a decision on Greenwood's future is made

  • INFLATION AT 6.4%: 2 ‘STRONG BUY’ DIVIDEND STOCKS THAT BEAT THIS RATE

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/inflation-6-4-2-strong-145024315.html

    88.89% Shortened!

    Both numbers are higher than expectations – analysts had been looking for a 0.4% monthly rate, and a 6.2% year-over-year rate

    By the numbers, the company saw a top line of $700.7 million for the quarter, and $2.4 billion for the year, year-over-year increases of 48% and 53%, respectively

    The full year results were company records

    Alliance showed full year 'cash from operations' of $791.8 million

    The stock’s average price target of $29.33 implies ~37% one-year upside from the current share price of $21.34

    (See ARLP stock forecast) Ternium S.A

    ['rate', 'year', 'dividend', 'stock', 'company']

    data nudged stocks down and the dollar up, while a slowdown in Britain’s price rise rate sent the pound tumbling

    Fed funds futures now imply a peak above 5.2% by mid-year and rates above 5% at year's end

    After a strong start to the year, analysts are bracing for a further retracement

  • ANWAR'S VISIT TO QUAKE-HIT TURKIYE SHOWS SUPPORT, MOTIVATION FOR MALAYSIAN RESCUE TEAMS, SAYS AMBASSADOR

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/02/15/anwar039s-visit-to-quake-hit-turkiye-shows-support-motivation-for-malaysian-rescue-teams-says-ambassador

    02/15/2023, 19:08

    68.42% Shortened!

    Wednesday, 15 Feb 2023

    "Turkiye and Malaysian governments share close relationship and His Excellency Malaysian Prime Minister (Anwar) is a close friend of our president (Recep Tayyip Erdogan)

    Anwar left for Turkiye last night to provide moral support to Erdogan and the Turkish people who were affected by the quake on Feb 6 that claimed tens of thousands of lives, with a special plane carrying Anwar taking off at about 11.15pm from at KLIA

    The Malaysian premier decided to make the visit at the request of Erdogan

    On Tuesday (Feb 14), Anwar announced that the Malaysian Government would channel RM20mil worth of humanitarian aid to Turkiye, and Syria which was also affected by the same quake

    On the role Malaysia can play in helping to rebuild and redevelop parts of Turkiye which were affected by the quake, Yuksel said a reconstruction plan need to be devised by the Turkish government as it involves a large area

    ['malaysian', 'anwar', 'turkiye', 'turkish', 'earthquake']

    Wednesday, 15 Feb 2023

    "Turkiye and Malaysian governments share close relationship and His Excellency Malaysian Prime Minister (Anwar) is a close friend of our president (Recep Tayyip Erdogan)

    Anwar left for Turkiye last night to provide moral support to Erdogan and the Turkish people who were affected by the quake on Feb 6 that claimed tens of thousands of lives, with a special plane carrying Anwar taking off at about 11.15pm from at KLIA

    The Malaysian premier decided to make the visit at the request of Erdogan

    On Tuesday (Feb 14), Anwar announced that the Malaysian Government would channel RM20mil worth of humanitarian aid to Turkiye, and Syria which was also affected by the same quake

    On the role Malaysia can play in helping to rebuild and redevelop parts of Turkiye which were affected by the quake, Yuksel said a reconstruction plan need to be devised by the Turkish government as it involves a large area

    ['malaysian', 'anwar', 'turkiye', 'turkish', 'earthquake']



  • SARAWAK DAP CHIEF CLAIMS LOPSIDED RACIAL COMPOSITION IN STATE CIVIL SERVICE DUE TO UNFAIR EMPLOYMENT INTAKE PROCEDURE

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2023/02/15/sarawak-dap-chief-claims-lopsided-racial-composition-in-state-civil-service-due-to-unfair-employment-intake-procedure/55101

    02/15/2023, 19:08

    60.0% Shortened!

    “If we look at the high-ranking officers in the civil service in the state, for example, there is a clear disproportionate representation of races in the state civil service,” he said in a statement

    He said both the ratios of the Chinese and the Dayak representations in the civil service are much less compared to their population in the state

    Chong also urged the state government to make public the present racial composition of the civil service at all different grades

    He said if the state government continues to adopt such a secretive approach in the matter, then the problem of imbalanced composition in the state civil service will not be rectified

    Recently, the Sarawak premier claimed that low pay deterred Chinese youth with Unified Examination Certificate (UEC) from applying for jobs in the state civil service

    Abang Johari said this is one of the problems that the state government will have to solve to attract more Chinese youth to state civil service jobs.

    ['sarawak', 'civil', 'service', 'state', 'government']

    “If we look at the high-ranking officers in the civil service in the state, for example, there is a clear disproportionate representation of races in the state civil service,” he said in a statement

    He said both the ratios of the Chinese and the Dayak representations in the civil service are much less compared to their population in the state

    Chong also urged the state government to make public the present racial composition of the civil service at all different grades

    He said if the state government continues to adopt such a secretive approach in the matter, then the problem of imbalanced composition in the state civil service will not be rectified

    Recently, the Sarawak premier claimed that low pay deterred Chinese youth with Unified Examination Certificate (UEC) from applying for jobs in the state civil service

    Abang Johari said this is one of the problems that the state government will have to solve to attract more Chinese youth to state civil service jobs.

    ['sarawak', 'civil', 'service', 'state', 'government']

  • CRISIS-HIT SPAIN COACH INSISTS HE HAS 'THE BEST TEAM'

    https://www.espn.com/soccer/spain-espw/story/4878299/crisis-hit-spain-coach-insists-he-has-the-best-team

    02/15/2023, 18:08

    45.45% Shortened!

    The head coach of Spain's women's crisis-hit national team, Jorge Vilda, claims he has the best Spanish squad possible as he brands questions surrounding the revolt among his country's leading players as "disrespectful." Vilda has been at the centre of a storm which has engulfed the Spanish side since September last year when a cohort of leading players called for him to quit

    The Spanish coach on Wednesday, however, hit back at questions that he hadn't selected the strongest La Roja side possible

    "I am asking for respect for my team," Vilda said through an interpreter

    "We are preparing for a World Cup and your questions seem a bit disrespectful towards the team

    "I have the best team that I want to train and nothing else." Vilda, whose side begin their Cup of Nations with a clash against Jamaica in Gosford on Thursday, was keen to point to his side's recent form as reason why they hoped to lift the World Cup in Australia later this year

    La Roja, ranked world No

    ['team', 'vilda', 'spanish', 'side', 'cup']

    The head coach of Spain's women's crisis-hit national team, Jorge Vilda, claims he has the best Spanish squad possible as he brands questions surrounding the revolt among his country's leading players as "disrespectful." Vilda has been at the centre of a storm which has engulfed the Spanish side since September last year when a cohort of leading players called for him to quit

    The Spanish coach on Wednesday, however, hit back at questions that he hadn't selected the strongest La Roja side possible

    "I am asking for respect for my team," Vilda said through an interpreter

    "We are preparing for a World Cup and your questions seem a bit disrespectful towards the team

    "I have the best team that I want to train and nothing else." Vilda, whose side begin their Cup of Nations with a clash against Jamaica in Gosford on Thursday, was keen to point to his side's recent form as reason why they hoped to lift the World Cup in Australia later this year

    La Roja, ranked world No

    He said the Malaysian SAR team comprising members of the Special Malaysia Disaster Assistance and Rescue Team (SMART), Fire and Rescue Department, Civil Defence Force, and Malaysian Armed Forces Royal Medical Corps stationed in Nurdagi has shown extraordinary capability with efforts that the nation can be proud of

    "I’m so proud of our team who have shown the extraordinary capability, making extraordinary sacrifices

    "The (Nurdagi) governor and governor representatives here also said that our team has shown an extraordinary level of dedication

    Anwar is scheduled to meet Erdogan in Ankara

    So far, the Malaysian SAR team had successfully brought out 47 bodies from under the rubble and rescued a family of five who survived.- Bernama

    MMA, however, did not condone the strike and urged the government to take the speculation seriously, and speed up reforms to address their long-standing grievances

    It was also reported that Ipoh Timur MP Howard Lee had raised concerns about an unannounced strike by healthcare workers

  • LYNAS GETS THREE-YEAR LICENCE RENEWAL BUT MUST STOP ACTIVITIES PRODUCING RADIOACTIVE WASTES BY JULY

    https://www.theedgemarkets.com/node/655337

    02/15/2023, 18:08

    72.73% Shortened!

    Chang said Lynas could appeal to extend the July deadline.

    Other conditions under the licence include building a Permanent Disposal Facility (PDF) to store radioactive waste and prohibition from importing lanthanide concentrates from Australia

    By July, Chang said the radioactive wastes would increase to an estimated 1.2 million metric tons

    “This PDF condition was [fixed] in 2020

    Chang revealed that the PDF location is now within Gebeng itself, “just beside the Lynas plant”

    Chang also said that none of his ministry officials will be held accountable for approving Lynas' production of radioactive wastes in the country on a tax-free basis for more than a decade, as it was a decision made by the then government of the day

    ['chang', 'say', 'lynas', 'radioactive', 'waste']

    Chang said Lynas could appeal to extend the July deadline.

    Other conditions under the licence include building a Permanent Disposal Facility (PDF) to store radioactive waste and prohibition from importing lanthanide concentrates from Australia

    By July, Chang said the radioactive wastes would increase to an estimated 1.2 million metric tons

    “This PDF condition was [fixed] in 2020

    Chang revealed that the PDF location is now within Gebeng itself, “just beside the Lynas plant”

    Chang also said that none of his ministry officials will be held accountable for approving Lynas' production of radioactive wastes in the country on a tax-free basis for more than a decade, as it was a decision made by the then government of the day

  • 2023 PERODUA AXIA MAINTENANCE COST VS 2019 AXIA - NEW D-CVT MODEL CHEAPER TO SERVICE THAN OLDER 4AT - PAULTAN.ORG

    https://paultan.org/2023/02/15/2023-perodua-axia-maintenance-cost-vs-2019-axia/

    02/15/2023, 17:08

    79.31% Shortened!

    The switch to the D-CVT has resulted in a revision to the Axia’s maintenance schedule, so we’re examining that in this post

    Diving into the details, both the new D-CVT and previous 4AT versions of the Axia share almost the same maintenance items, with no change in terms of their pricing

    Perodua did not list out any Pro Care items for the 2023 Axia, which were available for the previous model

    2023 Perodua Axia D-CVT maintenance schedule; click to enlarge As always, there’s more to overall running costs beyond scheduled visits to the official service centre

    The 2019 Axia peaked at RM43,190 for the range-topping Advance

    The 2023 Axia with a D-CVT is cheaper to maintain than its predecessor with a 4AT over five years or 100,000 km

    ['perodua', 'change', 'axia', 'cvt', 'previous']

    Lim’s lawyer Gobind Singh Deo told the court that the defence was trying to obtain the notes of proceedings of the case in the Shah Alam Sessions Court involving businessman G

    Gobind noted that during Gnanaraja’s trial, the court had heard that a sum of RM2mil was paid to someone else and not Lim

    Zarul Ahmad is currently on the witness stand, while Gnanaraja’s name is also on the prosecution witness list in the ongoing trial

    Lim allegedly committed the offence at the Penang Chief Minister’s Office, Level 28, Komtar, George Town, between Jan 2011 and Aug 2017

    In the second amended charge, Lim is accused of soliciting a bribe of 10% of the profit from the company as gratification to secure the project

  • BROTHERS ESCAPE GALLOWS AFTER COURT OF APPEAL OVERTURNS DRUG CONVICTION

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/02/15/brothers-escape-gallows-after-court-of-appeal-overturns-drug-conviction

    02/15/2023, 17:08

    62.5% Shortened!

    In the court's decision, Justice Hanipah said the High Court judge was duty-bound to consider all evidence before him but in this case, he failed to comply with Section 182A of the Criminal Procedure Code for not considering the defence case which amounted to a miscarriage of justice

    She said that based on the totality of the evidence adduced before the High Court judge, the conviction of Rubanraaj, 27 and Nagaraj, 35, were unsafe

    Both men, who were car repossessors, were found guilty of trafficking the drug and sentenced to death by the High Court on Feb 27, 2020

    Deputy Public Prosecutor Atiqah Abdul Karim argued that both men had the common intention to commit the crime and the High Court judge had evaluated the evidence

    She said although the High Court judge did not refer to the police reports, it did not affect the prosecution's case.- Bernama

    Thank you for your report! Copyright © 1995-

    ['court', 'appeal', 'say', 'high', 'judge']

    In the court's decision, Justice Hanipah said the High Court judge was duty-bound to consider all evidence before him but in this case, he failed to comply with Section 182A of the Criminal Procedure Code for not considering the defence case which amounted to a miscarriage of justice

    She said that based on the totality of the evidence adduced before the High Court judge, the conviction of Rubanraaj, 27 and Nagaraj, 35, were unsafe

    Both men, who were car repossessors, were found guilty of trafficking the drug and sentenced to death by the High Court on Feb 27, 2020

    Deputy Public Prosecutor Atiqah Abdul Karim argued that both men had the common intention to commit the crime and the High Court judge had evaluated the evidence

    She said although the High Court judge did not refer to the police reports, it did not affect the prosecution's case.- Bernama

    — SCMP Chinese social media has been stunned by a shocking video clip which shows a primary school pupil brandishing a chopper at his father because his dad would not let him play video games on his mobile phone

    The scary stand-off started when the father stopped the boy playing games and confiscated his mobile phone

    The boy became angry and grabbed the chopper to threaten his dad

    The person who shot the video said that the father is usually more indulgent with his son and the boy took exception this time

    The video has been viewed by more than 7 million people

  • BUFFETT'S QUICK US$3.7B SALE OF TSMC STOCK SPOOKS INVESTORS

    https://www.theedgemarkets.com/node/655296

    02/15/2023, 16:08

    64.71% Shortened!

    Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway Inc cut its holding of TSMC’s American depositary receipts by 86% last quarter, according to the latest filing

    TSMC had jumped in November amid news that Buffett had acquired a stake worth about US$5 billion, and it’s still up more than 40% from an October low

    The chip industry has had to contend with Covid-induced supply disruptions in China and a slump in demand for electronics amid surging inflation

    TSMC cut its spending target by about 10% in 2022 to about US$36 billion after the Biden administration slapped new restrictions on China’s access to critical technologies

    Late last year appeared to be a good time to buy TSMC shares as a value investor

    While the stock will likely suffer near term on news of Buffett’s selldown, TSMC’s longer term outlook is still positive, according to Taishin Securities’ Huang

    ['search', 'stock', 'buffett', 'tsmc', 'stake']

    Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway Inc cut its holding of TSMC’s American depositary receipts by 86% last quarter, according to the latest filing

    TSMC had jumped in November amid news that Buffett had acquired a stake worth about US$5 billion, and it’s still up more than 40% from an October low

    The chip industry has had to contend with Covid-induced supply disruptions in China and a slump in demand for electronics amid surging inflation

    TSMC cut its spending target by about 10% in 2022 to about US$36 billion after the Biden administration slapped new restrictions on China’s access to critical technologies

  • US URGED TO EXPLAIN BALLOON FLIGHTS IN CHINESE AIRSPACE

    https://www.thestar.com.my/aseanplus/aseanplus-news/2023/02/15/us-urged-to-explain-balloon-flights-in-chinese-airspace

    02/15/2023, 15:08

    70.0% Shortened!

    "The US needs to conduct a thorough investigation and give China an explanation," Wang said, calling on countries to pay attention to US' wiretapping and theft operations

    China has repeatedly made it clear that the unintended entry of an unmanned Chinese airship into US airspace was an unexpected and isolated incident

    "China calls on Nato to cease its unwarranted accusations against the country," Wang said, urging the alliance to stop creating imaginary enemies and pushing its boundaries

    In another development, Wang accused the US of "coercing and blackmailing" China by invoking the 1951 US-Philippines Mutual Defense Treaty, saying that this will in no way alter China's firm determination and strong will to safeguard its legitimate rights and interests

    His comments came as the US issued a statement on Monday saying that it stood with the Philippines after Manila accused the China Coast Guard of using a laser against the crew of a Philippine Coast Guard ship in the South China Sea

    The China Coast Guard ship acted "in a professional and restrained way", Wang said, adding that China and the Philippines have been in communication on the incident through diplomatic channels and the situation in the area is generally calm.

    ['china', 'balloon', 'country', 'wang', 'say']

  • GROUPS HOPE TOURISM MINISTER REVIEWS BLANKET BAN AGAINST INCLUDING SHOPPING AS TOUR ACTIVITY

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2023/02/15/groups-hope-tourism-minister-reviews-blanket-ban-against-including-shopping-as-tour-activity/55060

    02/15/2023, 15:08

    50.0% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Feb 15 — Several retailer groups and a tourism association today urged Tourism, Arts, and Culture Minister Datuk Seri Tiong King Sing to reconsider a blanket ban that effectively stops tour operators from listing shopping as part of the itinerary

    “Bringing tourists to shop in a shopping precinct or shopping malls but not to specific shops should be allowed and in fact, encouraged instead,” they said in a joint statement

    The groups are the Malaysia Retailers Association; the Bumiputera Retailers Organisation; the Bukit Bintang-KLCC Tourism Association Kuala Lumpur; the Batu Road Retailers Association; the Malaysia Retail Chain Association; the Malaysia Shopping Malls Association; and a trade coalition of 123 businesses called Industries Unite

    Tiong had announced the blanket bank on February 11 attributing to numerous complaints from tourists to Malaysia

    The groups said that they supported Tiong’s call for breaks in the tour itineraries but pointed out that shopping had been a major revenue source for Malaysia before the Covid-19 pandemic, contributing RM14.72 billion in 2019

    Malaysia’s total inbound travel expenditure in 2022 was RM27.9 billion.

    ['tourism', 'association', 'tour', 'shopping', 'say']

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Feb 15 — Several retailer groups and a tourism association today urged Tourism, Arts, and Culture Minister Datuk Seri Tiong King Sing to reconsider a blanket ban that effectively stops tour operators from listing shopping as part of the itinerary

    “Bringing tourists to shop in a shopping precinct or shopping malls but not to specific shops should be allowed and in fact, encouraged instead,” they said in a joint statement

    The groups are the Malaysia Retailers Association; the Bumiputera Retailers Organisation; the Bukit Bintang-KLCC Tourism Association Kuala Lumpur; the Batu Road Retailers Association; the Malaysia Retail Chain Association; the Malaysia Shopping Malls Association; and a trade coalition of 123 businesses called Industries Unite

    Tiong had announced the blanket bank on February 11 attributing to numerous complaints from tourists to Malaysia

    The groups said that they supported Tiong’s call for breaks in the tour itineraries but pointed out that shopping had been a major revenue source for Malaysia before the Covid-19 pandemic, contributing RM14.72 billion in 2019

    Malaysia’s total inbound travel expenditure in 2022 was RM27.9 billion.

  • JUDGE PAUSES GUAN ENG’S TRIAL ON PROPOSED PENANG UNDERSEA TUNNEL PENDING NOTES FROM ANOTHER COURT CASE

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2023/02/15/judge-pauses-guan-engs-trial-on-proposed-penang-undersea-tunnel-pending-notes-from-another-court-case/55045

    02/15/2023, 14:08

    62.5% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Feb 15 — The trial of Lim Guan Eng for the Penang undersea tunnel project at the Sessions Court here has been suspended today so that the defence can get notes from a separate court proceeding that could exonerate the former chief minister of purportedly receiving RM2 million in bribes

    Lim’s counsel Gobind Singh Deo told the court that the defence had filed an application to get the notes of proceedings from another Sessions Court in Shah Alam, Selangor on February 9 which was still pending

    He further explained to the court on the defence initially obtaining a copy of the Court Recording and Transcription (CRT) involving witness testimonies from the Shah Alam case and transcribed their own, but this had been subsequently disputed by the prosecution

    The evidence the defence is seeking to submit in the Penang undersea tunnel trial includes a transcript report of the full WhatsApp messages between two prosecution witnesses — Consortium Zenith Construction Sdn Bhd (CZCSB) director Datuk Zarul Ahmad Mohd Zulkifli and G

    Today, Gobind once again reiterated the defence's stance, claiming there was 'abuse of power through suppression of evidence by the prosecution', further noting the necessity of having the notes of proceedings from the other court as proof

    After hearing submissions, Session Court judge Azura Alwi later fixed March 1 for parties to update the court

    ['lim', 'project', 'court', 'defence', 'note']

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Feb 15 — The trial of Lim Guan Eng for the Penang undersea tunnel project at the Sessions Court here has been suspended today so that the defence can get notes from a separate court proceeding that could exonerate the former chief minister of purportedly receiving RM2 million in bribes

    Lim’s counsel Gobind Singh Deo told the court that the defence had filed an application to get the notes of proceedings from another Sessions Court in Shah Alam, Selangor on February 9 which was still pending

    He further explained to the court on the defence initially obtaining a copy of the Court Recording and Transcription (CRT) involving witness testimonies from the Shah Alam case and transcribed their own, but this had been subsequently disputed by the prosecution

    The evidence the defence is seeking to submit in the Penang undersea tunnel trial includes a transcript report of the full WhatsApp messages between two prosecution witnesses — Consortium Zenith Construction Sdn Bhd (CZCSB) director Datuk Zarul Ahmad Mohd Zulkifli and G

    Today, Gobind once again reiterated the defence's stance, claiming there was 'abuse of power through suppression of evidence by the prosecution', further noting the necessity of having the notes of proceedings from the other court as proof

    After hearing submissions, Session Court judge Azura Alwi later fixed March 1 for parties to update the court

    He also took back the mobile phone

    He also checked the WhatsApp chats, and discovered that she had sent the picture to her husband and her sister-in-law

    IBM said Accenture was its largest competitor in the Asia-Pacific region in terms of consulting revenue

    Chantaruck, who joined IBM in 2018, resigned last year and joined Accenture as Thailand managing director a month later, in April 2022, according to the suit

    Women of the Year “IBM and Accenture entities compete particularly in the information, digitalization, and consulting spaces, both globally and within the Asia-Pacific region,” IBM’s lawyers wrote in the complaint

    IBM said it had asked Chantaruck to return the money, but she refused

  • MAN IN CHINA ENDS UP HAVING TO SHARE LOTTERY WINNINGS WITH WIFE AFTER HIDING IT FROM HER

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/life/2023/02/15/man-in-china-ends-up-having-to-share-lottery-winnings-with-wife-after-hiding-it-from-her/55034

    02/15/2023, 13:08

    45.45% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Feb 15 — A man in China who concealed a lottery win from his wife has been ordered by a court to compensate her

    The man, identified by his surname Zhou, bought the ticket in 2021 and won a prize money of 10 million yuan (RM6.4 million), Oddity Central reported

    According to the portal, the man was left with 8.43 million yuan (RM5.4 million) after paying the mandatory taxes

    On the day the money was credited into his account, Zhou transferred two million yuan (RM1.3 million) to his sister and another 700,000 yuan (RM448,549) to his ex-wife so she could buy an apartment

    However, luck was not on Zhou's side when his current wife found out about the lottery win and filed for divorce

    The status of the wife's divorce proceedings against Zhou is presently unknown

    ['man', 'lottery', 'win', 'wife', 'zhou']

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Feb 15 — A man in China who concealed a lottery win from his wife has been ordered by a court to compensate her

    The man, identified by his surname Zhou, bought the ticket in 2021 and won a prize money of 10 million yuan (RM6.4 million), Oddity Central reported

    According to the portal, the man was left with 8.43 million yuan (RM5.4 million) after paying the mandatory taxes

    On the day the money was credited into his account, Zhou transferred two million yuan (RM1.3 million) to his sister and another 700,000 yuan (RM448,549) to his ex-wife so she could buy an apartment

    However, luck was not on Zhou's side when his current wife found out about the lottery win and filed for divorce

    The status of the wife's divorce proceedings against Zhou is presently unknown

  • MERCEDES-BENZ EQS500 CKD MALAYSIA: LUXURY EV GETS MORE POWER AND IS RM50K CHEAPER

    https://soyacincau.com/2023/02/15/mercedes-benz-eqs500-ckd-malaysia-luxury-ev-gets-more-power-and-is-rm50k-cheaper/

    02/15/2023, 13:08

    85.0% Shortened!

    Unlike the rear-wheel-drive EQS450+ before it, the EQS500 is powered by two electric motors—one at the front and back—to provide all-wheel drive

    It’s just as well, then, that the car can also accept up to 200 kW of DC fast charging power, which can fill the battery up from 10 to 80% in 31 minutes

    You also still get Airmatic air suspension and up to ten degrees of rear-wheel steering, helping to reduce the turning circle at low speeds

    Still no front boot underneath the stubby bonnet, however

    You also get active ambient lighting that’s bright enough to be seen in daylight, along with power-adjustable, heated and ventilated front (with a memory function) and rear seats

    One notable omission of this electric “boss car” remains, however—the rear seats still don’t offer a massage function, unlike the front

  • MERCEDES-BENZ PEKAN PLANT BEGINS TO ROLL OUT EQ ELECTRIC VEHICLES: STARTING WITH EQS

    https://www.lowyat.net/2023/294242/mercedes-eq-pekan-rollout-eqs-500-4matic/

    02/15/2023, 12:08

    64.71% Shortened!

    In yet another significant milestone for Mercedes-Benz Malaysia (MBM), the company today officially announced that the Mercedes-Benz Pekan production plant has begun to roll out Mercedes EQ all-electric vehicles

    This particular facility which has been in operation for the past 19 years has rolled out more than 100,000 Mercedes-Benz vehicles to date

    While one may though that the first rollout of Malaysian-made EQ vehicles would be the entry-level EQA, that isn’t the case at all

    Instead, the first EQ model to be assembled in Pekan is the flagship executive sedan EQS

    This made Pekan as the third oversea Mercedes-Benz assembly facility to work on EQS after Pune in India and Thailand’s Samut Prakan

    Not only that, the variant that Mercedes-Benz chose as the first Made-In-Pekan EQ model is the EQS 500 4MATIC which is a more powerful model than the fully imported EQS 450+ that was launched in Malaysia last year

    ['mercedes', 'benz', 'pekan', 'model', 'eq']

    In yet another significant milestone for Mercedes-Benz Malaysia (MBM), the company today officially announced that the Mercedes-Benz Pekan production plant has begun to roll out Mercedes EQ all-electric vehicles

    This particular facility which has been in operation for the past 19 years has rolled out more than 100,000 Mercedes-Benz vehicles to date

    While one may though that the first rollout of Malaysian-made EQ vehicles would be the entry-level EQA, that isn’t the case at all

    Instead, the first EQ model to be assembled in Pekan is the flagship executive sedan EQS

    This made Pekan as the third oversea Mercedes-Benz assembly facility to work on EQS after Pune in India and Thailand’s Samut Prakan

    Not only that, the variant that Mercedes-Benz chose as the first Made-In-Pekan EQ model is the EQS 500 4MATIC which is a more powerful model than the fully imported EQS 450+ that was launched in Malaysia last year

    ['mercedes', 'benz', 'pekan', 'model', 'eq']



  • JPJ IMPROVES MYJPJ APP, PUBLIC PORTAL SECURITY FEATURES

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/02/15/jpj-improves-myjpj-app-public-portal-security-features

    02/15/2023, 12:08

    53.85% Shortened!

    Wednesday, 15 Feb 2023

    JPJ director-general Datuk Zailani Hashim said the improvements included introducing third-level security using the last eight characters on the back of users’ driver’s licence for online JPJeID registration

    "The problem occurs when the users have an existing account on the JPJ strategic partner portal that integrates with the JPJ system,” he said in a statement today

    JPJ has also added ‘email reset’ function for users who have forgotten the email they used or need to update their email with an additional eight driving licence characters

    According to Zailani, the improvements were implemented in response to feedback from the public on the use of the MyJPJ application and the JPJ public portal, following the introduction of the digital Motor Vehicle Licence (e-LKM) and digital Malaysian Driving Licence (e-LMM)

    The public can contact the JPJ hotline at 03-27242522 or send an email to infodigital@jpj.gov.my for further enquiries

    ['jpj', 'security', 'user', 'public', 'portal']

    Wednesday, 15 Feb 2023

    JPJ director-general Datuk Zailani Hashim said the improvements included introducing third-level security using the last eight characters on the back of users’ driver’s licence for online JPJeID registration

    "The problem occurs when the users have an existing account on the JPJ strategic partner portal that integrates with the JPJ system,” he said in a statement today

    JPJ has also added ‘email reset’ function for users who have forgotten the email they used or need to update their email with an additional eight driving licence characters

    According to Zailani, the improvements were implemented in response to feedback from the public on the use of the MyJPJ application and the JPJ public portal, following the introduction of the digital Motor Vehicle Licence (e-LKM) and digital Malaysian Driving Licence (e-LMM)

    The public can contact the JPJ hotline at 03-27242522 or send an email to infodigital@jpj.gov.my for further enquiries

    ['jpj', 'security', 'user', 'public', 'portal']

    "Sarawak is the only state with a Unit for Other Religions

    It will be used for the school's maintenance and to purchase any items that the school needs, such as stationery or computers," the school board chairman said.

    02/15/2023, 11:08

    66.67% Shortened!

    Wednesday, 15 Feb 2023

    In a parliamentary written reply, the Minister in the Prime Minister’s Department (Law and Institutional Reform) said, however, that the probe is still ongoing and it requires additional information from abroad

    "Aside from the MACC, there are several other agencies that are involved in the probe including Bank Negara Malaysia, Inland Revenue Board and the police," she said

    She added that all the relevant enforcement agencies will be given sufficient space to make their careful assessment and investigation before enforcement action can be taken

    Police had also opened investigation papers to look into the allegations

    Then prime minister Datuk Seri Ismail Sabri Yaakob had said that the government would not interfere with the authorities pursuit of the case based on the information in the papers

  • LYNAS TO STOP PRODUCING RADIOACTIVE WASTE IN MALAYSIA

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/02/15/lynas-to-stop-producing-radioactive-waste-in-malaysia

    02/15/2023, 10:08

    66.67% Shortened!

    “In other words, Lynas is not allowed to carry out activities that will produce radioactive waste in Malaysia after July 2023

    It had been previously reported by several media outlets that the government would likely insist that Lynas stick to the condition of ending the accumulation of mildly radioactive residue from its rare earths processing in Malaysia by July

    The current three-year term of Lynas Malaysia’s operating licence is set to expire next month

    After that period, Lynas would no longer be allowed to import raw materials containing naturally occurring radioactive material into Malaysia

    In its quarterly activities report in January, Lynas said capital works were underway at Lynas Malaysia to receive and process mixed rare earth carbonate feedstock to be produced at its new Kalgoorlie rare earth processing facility in the state of Western Australia

    Report it to us

    ['rare', 'earth', 'lynas', 'radioactive', 'malaysia']

    “In other words, Lynas is not allowed to carry out activities that will produce radioactive waste in Malaysia after July 2023

    It had been previously reported by several media outlets that the government would likely insist that Lynas stick to the condition of ending the accumulation of mildly radioactive residue from its rare earths processing in Malaysia by July

    The current three-year term of Lynas Malaysia’s operating licence is set to expire next month

    After that period, Lynas would no longer be allowed to import raw materials containing naturally occurring radioactive material into Malaysia

    In its quarterly activities report in January, Lynas said capital works were underway at Lynas Malaysia to receive and process mixed rare earth carbonate feedstock to be produced at its new Kalgoorlie rare earth processing facility in the state of Western Australia

    Report it to us

    ['rare', 'earth', 'lynas', 'radioactive', 'malaysia']

    As the sole right-winger at the club, especially since Sadio Mané's departure, Salah has had to play week in and week out essentially without much of a rest

    Sign up to the Liverpool.com newsletter here — it only takes a few seconds! That can be solved by signing a back-up option who can compete with Salah for the right-wing spot and also provide cover when Salah isn't 100 per cent match fit or needs a rest

    The club's new sporting director will have to find the right fit, and for the right price as well

    But there's one player who could just be available for the right price who has been catching the eye on the right wing and who could definitely take Salah's place in the side first as a back-up and then as his heir in the future

  • CAR PRICES HIT RECORD HIGH AS PRODUCERS LIMIT OUTPUT

    https://www.thestar.com.my/business/business-news/2023/02/15/car-prices-hit-record-high-as-producers-limit-output

    02/15/2023, 09:08

    81.25% Shortened!

    “The idea of a new car in every American’s driveway is not the world we live in,” said Charlie Chesbrough, a senior economist at Cox

    For a decade, the average new-car payment in the United States bumped along at roughly US$400 (RM1,740) a month

    The average price for a new vehicle in the United States has jumped to almost US$50,000 (RM217,550), up 30% since 2019, according to JPMorgan

    The average price of a used car, meanwhile, now stands at about US$27,000 (RM117,477), Cox data showed

    In Europe, meanwhile, new-car prices are at all-time highs and still climbing, according to data from ING Research

    Vehicle shortages drove used-car prices up in Japan through most of last year

    ['year', 'new', 'car', 'average', 'use']

  • CYCLONE GABRIELLE MOVES AWAY FROM NEW ZEALAND, RECOVERY EFFORTS BEGIN

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/world/2023/02/15/cyclone-gabrielle-moves-away-from-new-zealand-recovery-efforts-begin/55001

    02/15/2023, 09:08

    66.67% Shortened!

    Gabrielle, which reached New Zealand on Sunday before making its way down the east coast of the North Island, cut off entire towns, washed away farms, bridges and livestock, and inundated homes, stranding people on roof tops

    Parts of New Zealand's North Island, where about 75 per cent of the country's 5 million residents live, are enduring their second major storm in as many weeks

    Two other people have been confirmed dead in Hawke's Bay, a region on the eastern coast of the North Island

    Authorities estimate more than 10,000 people have been displaced so far

    Evacuations continue Meteorological service WeatherWatch said Cyclone Gabrielle is now east of the country and continuing to track away from the North Island with weather now improving

    Mother of four Jennie Perris, who lives on a 10-acre (4-hectare) block of land on the outskirts of Whangarei, about 170km (106 miles) north of Auckland, said the family had been without power since Sunday

    ['new', 'zealand', 'country', 'people', 'north']

  • DON'T DISCOURAGE SHOPPING, A MAJOR SPENDING COMPONENT OF TOURIST ACTIVITIES: MATTA CHIEF

    https://www.thesundaily.my/local/dont-discourage-shopping-a-major-spending-component-of-tourist-activities-matta-chief-DE10638865

    02/15/2023, 09:08

    72.73% Shortened!

    According to the Tourism Satellite Account (a standard statistical framework and the main tool for the economic measurement of tourism), shopping made up 33.3% of the RM89.4 billion in inbound tourism expenditure and 42.1% of the RM92.6 billion in domestic tourism expenditure in 2019

    “The industry understands where the minister is coming from

    “But the retail industry as a whole should not be painted with the same brush

    Tourists will want to go to a shopping centre where they can have a variety of choices.” Ameer pointed out that tourist spending on shopping is about 33% of their total spending, and most tourists will not know where to visit without the help of a guide

    For example, Saudi Arabia is coming up with more tourist-friendly policies

    Ameer called on the government to set up international tourist centres in major towns where local and foreign visitors can visit, enjoy themselves, and learn more about the country

    ['shopping', 'tourist', 'say', 'tourism', 'make']

  • RM5 A PLATE AT OLDEST NASI KANDAR RESTAURANT

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/02/15/rm5-a-plate-at-oldest-nasi-kandar-restaurant

    02/15/2023, 09:08

    68.42% Shortened!

    Hameediyah Restaurant manager Muhammad Salim Ahamed Seeni Pakir said it wanted to make its nasi kandar available primarily to the B40 community and hoped other consumers would act responsibly

    “We hope our customers will have empathy and know that this initiative is for the poor and needy,” he said, adding that the restaurant would not have a mechanism to stop anyone from buying its Menu Rahmah selections

    Muhammad Salim said this after the launch of Menu Rahmah at the restaurant, well known for its nasi kandar since its inception in 1907

    Menu Rahmah will be available at Hameediyah Restaurant outlets in Sungai Ara and Campbell Street starting from next month

    “We might offer Menu Rahmah selections at specific hours and those who come then can enjoy the reduced prices,” he said

    For the B40 group to enjoy Hameediyah Restaurant’s cooking, Muhammad Salim said a meal that would normally be sold at RM10 would instead be priced at RM5 under Menu Rahmah

    ['menu', 'rahmah', 'restaurant', 'initiative', 'say']

    DBKL tearing down illegal partitions found at premises in Jalan Petaling during a recent operation.

    (Right) DBKL officers seizing items sold by an illegal trader near Pasar Harian Selayang

    DBKL, in a statement on its Facebook page, said the operation was part of a bigger effort to clamp down on vice dens in the city

    During the operation, DBKL tore down 54 illegal partitions at the premises and confiscated more than 150 items, including condoms and lubricants

    Another operation in Jalan Selayang Baru near Pasar Harian Selayang found nine UNHCR cardholders – all from Myanmar – selling fruits and vegetables

    Their wares were confiscated and sent to a storage facility in Taman Miharja, said DBKL

  • FORMER TOP COP SENTENCED TO DEATH

    https://www.thestar.com.my/aseanplus/aseanplus-news/2023/02/15/former-top-cop-sentenced-to-death

    02/15/2023, 08:08

    81.25% Shortened!

    Ferdy’s sentence was heavier than the life imprisonment sought by prosecutors

    Furious, Ferdy summoned another subordinate, junior police officer Richard Eliezer Pudihang Lumliu, 24, and asked if he “had the guts to shoot” Nofriansyah

    Ferdy told Richard that Nofriansyah had insulted him and that he “must die”, Wahyu told the court

    “The defendant said if Richard were to kill, Ferdy would be able to protect him

    But if Ferdy were to kill instead, he wouldn’t be able to protect everyone,” the judge said

    That evening, at Ferdy’s residence in South Jakarta, Richard fired his Glock-17 three or four times at an unarmed Nofriansyah until he collapsed

    ['ferdy', 'sentence', 'court', 'police', 'nofriansyah']

  • MORE EV INCENTIVES SOON

    https://www.thestar.com.my/business/business-news/2023/02/15/more-ev-incentives-soon

    02/15/2023, 08:08

    77.78% Shortened!

    Tengku Zafrul said Miti is looking into policies to ensure the country’s EV ecosystem is fully supported

    Tengku Zafrul also pointed out that a total of 26 projects worth RM14.7bil in the EV sector were approved by Mida from 2018 to September 2022

    Ni Hsin EV Tech Sdn Bhd has also announced the introduction of its EV motorcycles, noted Tengku Zafrul

    Tengku Zafrul said the country’s Low Carbon Mobility Blueprint (LCMB) 2021-2030 will evaluate the best energy and greenhouse gas mitigation options for the transportation sector

    Tengku Zafrul said the nascent global EV industry provides significant room for growth, particularly in South-East Asia which has plenty of potential as both a manufacturing hub and market for EVs

    Tengku Zafrul pointed out that the country is a leading electrical and electronics manufacturing hub in South-East Asia

  • FAMILIAR FACE SPOTTED AFTER FSG TAKEOVER CLAIM AS ARSÈNE WENGER LABELS LIVERPOOL STAR 'WORLD-CLASS'

    https://www.liverpool.com/liverpool-fc-news/features/fsg-takeover-liverpool-arsene-wenger-26238542

    02/15/2023, 08:08

    68.42% Shortened!

    Sign up to receive the best LFC opinion direct to your inbox We have more newsletters Welcome to the Liverpool.com daily Media Digest

    *** Former Liverpool chairman spotted during Merseyside derby The man who played a behind-the-scenes role in selling Liverpool to FSG in 2010 was spotted inside Anfield during the 2-0 win against Everton

    Sir Martin Broughton was chairman of Liverpool in late 2010 when the club was sold to FSG

    Broughton then stepped aside as Tom Werner entered the role, and Broughton’s association with Liverpool ended there

    Our newsletter subscribers get a rundown Monday to Friday from one of the best Liverpool FC writers — straight to your inbox, and completely for free

    Tengku Zafrul said Miti is looking into policies to ensure the country’s EV ecosystem is fully supported

    Tengku Zafrul also pointed out that a total of 26 projects worth RM14.7bil in the EV sector were approved by Mida from 2018 to September 2022

    Ni Hsin EV Tech Sdn Bhd has also announced the introduction of its EV motorcycles, noted Tengku Zafrul

    Tengku Zafrul said the country’s Low Carbon Mobility Blueprint (LCMB) 2021-2030 will evaluate the best energy and greenhouse gas mitigation options for the transportation sector

    Tengku Zafrul said the nascent global EV industry provides significant room for growth, particularly in South-East Asia which has plenty of potential as both a manufacturing hub and market for EVs

    Tengku Zafrul pointed out that the country is a leading electrical and electronics manufacturing hub in South-East Asia

    Sign up to the Liverpool.com newsletter here — it only takes a few seconds! It could be too premature to suggest that Liverpool are back to their old selves but, this said, Liverpool looked a lot closer to their best against the Toffees

    Of course, Gakpo showed signs last night that he can operate in a false nine role akin to what Firmino has for Liverpool but, given Klopp’s desire for his players to be comfortable in a variety of positions, this tweak to the Dutchman’s role doesn’t seem beyond the realms of possibility

    With the spotlight having been on Liverpool's midfield during a dismal January, perhaps Gakpo's performance last night offers a glimmer of hope that solutions can be found within the squad for the time being

  • BILLIONAIRE JOHN PAULSON: CENTRAL BANKS ARE REPLACING DOLLARS WITH GOLD, YOU ARE BETTER OFF INVESTING IN PRECIOUS METAL THAN USD

    https://www.kitco.com/news/2023-02-14/Billionaire-John-Paulson-central-banks-are-replacing-dollars-with-gold-you-are-better-off-investing-in-precious-metal-than-USD.html

    02/15/2023, 07:08

    82.35% Shortened!

    (Kitco News) Gold will increase in value while the U.S

    dollar drops, said Paulson & Co

    Gold will go up and the dollar will go down, so you'd be better off keeping your investment reserves in gold at this point," Paulson told journalist Alain Elkann in an interview

    Gold represents a legitimate alternative to the greenback and other fiat money

    "We're at the beginning of trends that are going to increase the demand for gold, and inflation and geopolitical tensions will determine the rate at which gold increases

    This year gold will appreciate versus the dollar, and also over a three, five, and ten-year basis," he said

    ['gold', 'dollar', 'say', 'paulson', 'year']

    (Kitco News) Gold will increase in value while the U.S

    dollar drops, said Paulson & Co

    Gold will go up and the dollar will go down, so you'd be better off keeping your investment reserves in gold at this point," Paulson told journalist Alain Elkann in an interview

    Gold represents a legitimate alternative to the greenback and other fiat money

    "We're at the beginning of trends that are going to increase the demand for gold, and inflation and geopolitical tensions will determine the rate at which gold increases

    This year gold will appreciate versus the dollar, and also over a three, five, and ten-year basis," he said

    But you can bring up more general topics around money, Kennedy says

    “In so many ways, money exists from the very beginning,” Kennedy adds

  • SHOPEE MALAYSIA BEGINS TO PROVIDE SLOAN PERSONAL LOAN SERVICE

    https://www.lowyat.net/2023/294224/shopee-malaysia-sloan-cash-loan-service/

    02/15/2023, 01:08

    57.14% Shortened!

    Through SLoan, Shopee Malaysia customers are able to obtain cash loans within 24 hours

    According to the service’s FAQ document, the first withdrawal from the service must be at least RM1,000 while subsequent withdrawals have to be in multiples of RM100

    While the document explicitly noted the minimum loan amount, it didn’t provide any information regarding the maximum amount of loan that customers can obtain from the service

    That being said, several screenshots within the FAQ document noted that the maximum amount of loan is RM100,000

    Customers also should take note of other costs that are associated with this service including the stamping fee which is 0.5% of the loan amount, and the RM5 attestation fee for each loan withdrawal

    As mentioned earlier, Shopee Malaysia is currently providing the SLoan service only to selected users for the time being

    ['shopee', 'malaysia', 'loan', 'service', 'customer']

    That being said, several screenshots within the FAQ document noted that the maximum amount of loan is RM100,000

    Customers also should take note of other costs that are associated with this service including the stamping fee which is 0.5% of the loan amount, and the RM5 attestation fee for each loan withdrawal

    As mentioned earlier, Shopee Malaysia is currently providing the SLoan service only to selected users for the time being

    Sivanesan said it is an unwritten understanding to dress appropriately when visiting governmental premises

    Sivanesan said while he was not saying anyone was at fault over the dress code kerfuffle at Kampar Hospital, people should dress appropriately when seeking treatment at government clinics or hospitals

    "I am not saying what the hospital did is correct and I (still) need to investigate (the incident)," he said, adding that all hospitals, including private ones, have the discretion to set a dress code

  • REPORT: SELAYANG HOSPITAL PATIENT STABBED BY ANOTHER PATIENT STRANDED IN EMERGENCY DEPARTMENT

    https://codeblue.galencentre.org/2023/02/14/report-selayang-hospital-patient-stabbed-by-another-patient-stranded-in-emergency-department/

    02/14/2023, 23:08

    62.5% Shortened!

    Singapore’s Straits Times reports that a psychiatric patient in Selayang Hospital – upset about being stranded in the emergency room along with dozens of others as all wards were full – stabbed another patient earlier today, causing serious injuries

    KUALA LUMPUR, Feb 14 – A patient was seriously injured after getting stabbed by a psychiatric patient today in Selayang Hospital, as the latter was allegedly upset at being stranded in the overcrowded emergency department

    Singapore’s The Straits Times reported that all the wards at the public hospital in Selangor were full at the time of the incident and that dozens were waiting in the emergency room

    Health director-general Dr Noor Hisham Abdullah, in a tweet, confirmed the stabbing incident, saying that the psychiatric patient had been brought in to Selayang Hospital by the police

    One of the doctors interviewed by CodeBlue said that patients are stranded in the emergency department of Selayang Hospital, a tertiary Ministry of Health (MOH) hospital, for between 24 and 72 hours

    CodeBlue’s nationwide survey last month among more than 1,600 health care workers in the government health service – which is reportedly suffering from dire staff shortages – showed that 95 per cent believe that the public health care system is currently in crisis

    ['time', 'report', 'patient', 'hospital', 'emergency']

    I truly believe my comments in my previous press conference to defend my club but I didn't represent my club well putting his name in these stupid comments

    https://www.fxstreet.com/news/us-cpi-preview-forecasts-from-12-major-banks-inflation-continues-to-decelerate-202302131559

    On a monthly basis, the CPI is forecast at 0.5% while the Core CPI is expected at 0.4%

    “We expect core inflation to rise to 0.4% MoM

    Core MoM should be stable (DB +0.36%)

    After three months of an apparent slowing in core CPI increases from October through December, we expect CPI to pick back up to a 0.4-0.5% pace with a 0.43% MoM rise in January core CPI

    We look for YoY CPI inflation to be 6.2% in January

    On a YoY basis, we expect January core CPI would result in core easing to 5.4% from 5.7% and headline to 6.2% from 6.5%.” “We forecast core CPI at 0.4% MoM

  • NO RACIAL DISCRIMINATION IN RECRUITMENT OF CIVIL SERVANTS, SAYS PUBLIC SERVICES COMMISSION

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/02/14/no-racial-discrimination-in-recruitment-of-civil-servants-says-public-services-commission

    02/14/2023, 22:08

    72.73% Shortened!

    "Interested and qualified candidates can apply for positions online through the Public Services Commission Job Registration System (SPA9) and those who meet the service scheme appointment requirements for vacant positions, will be called to sit for the Public Service Entrance Exam (PSEE)

    "Before candidates are certified for appointment, they must pass an integrity check through a system integrated with information from the Malaysia Office of the Chief Government Security Officer, the Royal Malaysia Police, the Insolvency Department, the Malaysian Anti-Corruption Commission, the National Registration Department, the National Anti-Drug Agency and the Public Service Department,” it added

    Ramasamy through a post on Facebook had asked the government to implement reforms in the civil service as he claimed that the sector is being dominated by Malays

    He also urged Prime Minister Datuk Seri Anwar Ibrahim to immediately deal with the issue and ensure that the civil service reflects the ethnic composition of the country

    Anwar was reported to have said that the government will not take into consideration the call for reforms in the civil service because the government did not view the matter as an issue

    Public Services Commission of Malaysia

    ['civil', 'say', 'public', 'service', 'spa']

    "Interested and qualified candidates can apply for positions online through the Public Services Commission Job Registration System (SPA9) and those who meet the service scheme appointment requirements for vacant positions, will be called to sit for the Public Service Entrance Exam (PSEE)

    "Before candidates are certified for appointment, they must pass an integrity check through a system integrated with information from the Malaysia Office of the Chief Government Security Officer, the Royal Malaysia Police, the Insolvency Department, the Malaysian Anti-Corruption Commission, the National Registration Department, the National Anti-Drug Agency and the Public Service Department,” it added

    Ramasamy through a post on Facebook had asked the government to implement reforms in the civil service as he claimed that the sector is being dominated by Malays

  • PKR'S WONG CHEN MOOTS PETRONAS IPO TO CUT NATIONAL DEBT

    https://www.theedgemarkets.com/node/655229

    02/14/2023, 22:08

    53.85% Shortened!

    “The listing of Petronas will provide a massive cash injection to pare down the national debt, provide more financial transparency and better governance to Petronas, hence improving overall fiscal revenue for the government,” he said at the Dewan Rakyat, while debating on the motion of thanks on the royal address

    Wong (PKR-Subang) believes that proceeds raised from the Petronas IPO could reduce the government’s debts to about 30% of gross domestic products (GDP) in 10- to 15 years

    “With the listing of Petronas, with a 20% stake sold to the public, we could raise RM300 billion, increasing profit by RM60 billion a year

    “Therefore, I urge the government to conduct a comprehensive study immediately, before factors like climate change affect valuation of Petronas’ assets

    Apart from a possible listing of Petronas, Wong also urged Putrajaya to cut out corruption with a better procurement policy due to the government’s tight fiscal space, and avoid introducing new tax amid an uncertain global economy

    In this global situation, I wish to advice my own government to not introduce any new tax to strengthen the government’s fiscal condition

    ['search', 'wong', 'petronas', 'government', 'debt']

  • LYNAS DISAPPOINTED OVER GOVT'S DECISION TO MAINTAIN LICENCE CONDITIONS

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/02/14/lynas-disappointed-over-govts-decision-to-maintain-licence-conditions

    02/14/2023, 21:08

    50.0% Shortened!

    Its chief executive officer and managing director Amanda Lacaze said the latest renewal of Lynas Malaysia's operating licence was its sixth and the four licences granted prior to 2020 did not include these conditions

    "While these conditions do not come into effect until July 1, they are inconsistent with the conditions upon which Lynas was invited to invest in Malaysia and the recommendations of four independent scientific reviews, each of which has found our Malaysian operations to be low risk and compliant with regulations," she said in a statement

    Science, Technology and Innovation Minister Chang Lih Kang said Lynas had been informed of the decision by the Atomic Energy Licensing Board (AELB), where its request to drop four conditions related to cracking and leaching activities, the generation of water leach purification (WLP) residues and the importation of lanthanide concentrates from Australia was not considered

    This meant Lynas would no longer be allowed to carry out activities that would produce radioactive waste in Malaysia after July 2023

    The current three-year term of Lynas Malaysia's operating licence is set to expire in March

    Lacaze said Lynas would now proceed with administrative and legal appeals to ensure that Lynas was treated fairly and equitably as a foreign direct investor and a significant employer and contributor to the Malaysian economy

    ['lynas', 'condition', 'licence', 'say', 'malaysia']

  • EX-PAKATAN REPS STEVEN CHOONG, PAUL YONG GAIN POSTS IN PBM SHAKE-UP

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2023/02/14/ex-pakatan-reps-steven-choong-paul-yong-gain-posts-in-pbm-shake-up/54955

    02/14/2023, 21:08

    45.45% Shortened!

    Former Perak DAP assemblyman Paul Yong, who is appealing his conviction last year for raping a former maid, was named a senior vice president in the party

    Sri Aman MP Datuk Masir Anak Kujat will be PBM’s new secretary-general following a supreme council meeting held on Feb 10, the party said in a statement

    “The measure had been taken to rekindle the party’s strength so that it can continue to be relevant in building the country alongside the Malaysian unity government,” it said

    Prior to the 15th general election, PBM had appeared set to be a platform for several former Pakatan Harapan politicians who joined the controversial “Sheraton Move” in 2020, until a tussle broke out between Sng and Datuk Zuraida Kamaruddin who had expected to take over the party

    After a brief confrontation, Sng reasserted control over PBM and reached an accord with Zuraida and her faction, several of whom went on to contest in GE15 on the party’s ticket

    However, all of the party’s candidates except Sng eventually lost in the election.

    ['new', 'follow', 'datuk', 'sng', 'president']

    A post shared by Manchester United (@manchesterunited) Elsewhere, there is no sign yet of Antony, Scott McTominay or Anthony Martial, who all missed Sunday’s game at Leeds through injury

    Casemiro can play in this game because his suspension is domestic, but Marcel Sabitzer will miss out because he is banned for this one

    That does not do much for United’s depth, as they keep playing games every few days with largely the same players, although Ten Hag did try and give some defenders a rest on Sunday

    It is a huge month for United, and at the end of it, they could have knocked Barcelona out of Europe and won the EFL Cup

    ['emeran', 'united', 'ten', 'hag', 'game']

    Noam Emeran has been pictured in first team training as Manchester United prepare to face Barcelona on Thursday

    Facundo Pellistri is the latest to benefit, and he is being slowly eased into the first team picture by Ten Hag, despite being a full international

    02/14/2023

    62.5% Shortened!

    The sun shines behind the United Nations Secretariat Building at the United Nations Headquarters, in New York City, on New York, on Jun 18, 2021

    The report accused China, a permanent member of the UN security council, of "arbitrary and discriminatory detention" in the predominantly Muslim Xinjiang province, and recommended that Beijing take steps to release all those held in training centres, prisons or detention facilities

    A Western-led bid to hold a debate on China's treatment of Muslim populations at the UN Human Rights Council did not pass, however

    The United States has accused China of genocide

    Beijing denies any abuses.

    He did not say when the meeting took place.  “We agreed on the cost overrun figure of US$1.2 billion

  • INDIA'S HAL IN TALKS ON TEJAS FIGHTER JET EXPORTS, FACES MALAYSIA SETBACK

    https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/indias-hal-talks-with-four-countries-export-tejas-fighter-jets-2023-02-14/

    02/14/2023, 19:08

    75.0% Shortened!

    Malaysia has shortlisted the Tejas light fighter jet for an order of around 16 planes, and Argentina, Egypt and Botswana have also expressed interest, HAL Chairman and Managing Director C B Ananthakrishnan told reporters at a conference during Aero India, the country's biggest aviation event

    View 2 more stories HAL is targeting export sales of 25 billion Indian rupees ($302.15 million) over the next few years, its director of operations Jayadeva EP told Reuters

    The Indian government in 2021 gave a $6 billion contract to HAL for 83 of the locally produced Tejas jets for delivery starting around 2023 - four decades after the design began in 1983

    The Tejas has been beset by design and other challenges, and was once rejected by the Indian Navy as too heavy

    HAL plans to use the General Electric (GE.N) manufactured 414 engine on a second generation of light-combat aircraft, Ananthakrishnan said, adding it was in talks to produce those engines in India

    Reuters, the news and media division of Thomson Reuters, is the world’s largest multimedia news provider, reaching billions of people worldwide every day

    ['reuters', 'india', 'light', 'say', 'tejas']

    02/14/2023, 19:08

    Liverpool tried signing Perr Schuurs before he joined Torino from Ajax last summer and this was confirmed by his agent in September 2022

    Schuurs’ explosion in Serie A has not gone unnoticed in Italy and England, where Liverpool are in the mix

    That’s according to Tuttosport, who explain Schuurs’s agent has had a series of contacts with the Premier League sides

    An auction between the English sides could make Schuurs’ asking price rise to €50m and this is the figure the Turin club are targeting from his possible sale in the summer

    The salary Liverpool and other top Premier League sides could offer the player would be almost impossible for Torino to match

    If Schuurs were to be sold for €50m, it would help the Italian club finance other operations in the next window

  • THAILAND TO IMPOSE RM39 ENTRY FEE FOR FOREIGN TRAVELLERS FROM JUNE AS TOURISM BOOMS

    https://www.thestar.com.my/aseanplus/aseanplus-news/2023/02/14/thailand-to-impose-rm39-entry-fee-for-foreign-travellers-from-june-as-tourism-booms

    02/14/2023, 19:08

    62.5% Shortened!

    Tuesday, 14 Feb 2023

    The entry fee, widely criticized by local tourism industry, comes as the nation famed for its Buddhist temples, beaches and national parks is witnessing a rush in tourist arrivals that’s gained momentum with the abolition of pandemic-era curbs and China’s move to end it Zero-Covid policy

    Foreign tourist arrivals may reach as high as 30 million this year, almost tripling from 11.2 million last year, according to some estimates

    Thailand has for long mooted an entry fee for foreign travelers but its implementation was delayed by the pandemic

    A part of the fee will help fund the development of local tourist attractions, Phiphat said

    The levy will be added to air ticket prices, while the method of collections from entry by land has yet to be determined, the government said last year

    ['thailand', 'entry', 'fee', 'foreign', 'tourism']

    Foreign tourist arrivals may reach as high as 30 million this year, almost tripling from 11.2 million last year, according to some estimates

    Thailand has for long mooted an entry fee for foreign travelers but its implementation was delayed by the pandemic

    A part of the fee will help fund the development of local tourist attractions, Phiphat said

    The levy will be added to air ticket prices, while the method of collections from entry by land has yet to be determined, the government said last year

  • FATHER FINED RM10,000 FOR CAUSING THREE-MONTH-OLD BABY'S DEATH

    https://www.thesundaily.my/home/father-fined-rm10000-for-causing-three-month-old-baby-s-death-HE10636230

    02/14/2023, 19:08

    53.85% Shortened!

    Amirul Hakim pleaded guilty on Jan 31 to negligently causing the death of his son by inflicting head injuries at a house in Flat Sri Langkawi, Gombak, here, at 4.15 pm on Jan 3

    The doctor who treated the victim confirmed that the baby had broken his right thigh and was given fever medication

    After the incident, the accused took his son for a massage and the victim's legs were able to be straightened, but the victim suffered seizures twice, on Nov 30, 2022, and Jan 3, this year

    When the baby had a seizure on Jan 3, he was found limp and unresponsive

    While the accused was taking his son to the clinic, the accused's left hand hit an iron grate and his son's head hit the wooden frame of the front door

    Deputy Public Prosecutor Wan Ahmad Hakimi Wan Ahmad Jaafar prosecuted while Amirul Hakim was unrepresented

    ['year', 'jan', 'son', 'accuse', 'victim']

    The doctor who treated the victim confirmed that the baby had broken his right thigh and was given fever medication
